subject: re:Can't afford medications you need?
body:
Dear valued member.
Buy your drugs from the comfort of your home and save up to 20% on pharmaceutical products with MyCanadianPharmacy. 
There is no need to purchase expensive American drugs. Save money buying cheaper Canadian products.Our products are manufactured according to the same strict medical standards as US medications.
Just click herehttp://majoryet.hk
Easy and secure ordering process.All your personal information will remain private and confidential.The highest quality customer service. Fast and safe delivery. 
Best regards,Debra Breeton
